data.title: Anderson Research Group
data.meta_description: A collection of previous members of the HLA group, including those who have gone on to start their own groups.
data.text:
Former Group Members

Some of our past group members have gone on to form academic research groups of their own, extending the Anderson research family. Click on their names to visit their research websites.

Previous Members Position in the HLA group Current Institution Ed Anderson Part II 1996-1997 Oxford University, UK Keith Andrews PDRA (2018-2020), JRF Linacre College (2020-23) Durham university, UK Milan Balaz Postdoctoral RA 2005-2008 Yonsei University, South Korea Qiang Chen Postdoctoral RA 2020-2023 Soochow University, China Rienk Eelkema Postdoctoral RA 2006-2008 Delft University Pablo Rivera-Fuentes Postdoctoral RA 2014-2015 University of Zurich, Switzerland Przemyslaw Gawel Postdoctoral RA 2015-2019 Polish Academy of Sciences, Poland Michael Hall Part II 1998-1999 Newcastle University, UK Andreas Jentzsch Postdoctoral RA 2016-17 University of Strasbourg, France Huriye Akdas-Kilig Postdoctoral RA 2002-2004 University of Rennes, France Matthew Langton Part II 2010-2011 Oxford University, UK Bart Limburg Postdoctoral RA 2016-2018 University of Barcelona, Spain Mitsuhiko Morisue Visiting Academic 2010-2011 Kyoto Institute of Technology, Japan Takashi Nakamura Visiting Student 2010 Assistant Professor at the University of Tsukuba, Japan Takashi Nakanishi Postdoctoral RA 2003 National Institute for Materials Science, Tsukuba, Japan Milosz Pawlicki Postdoctoral RA 2007-2008 Jagiellonian University, Kraków, Poland Martin Peeks Postdoctoral RA (2017, 2018-19) University of New South Wales, Australia William Peveler Part II 2010-2011 University of Glasgow Guzman Gil-Ramirez Postdoctoral RA 2010-2012 University of Lincoln, UK Michel Rickhaus Postdoctoral RA 2016-2019 University of Zurich, Switzerland Sophie Rousseaux Postdoctoral RA 2012-2015 University of Toronto, Canada Giuseppe Sforazzini DPhil Student 2006-2010 University of Cagliari, Italy Atsuomi Shundo Postdoctoral RA 2009-2010 Kyushu University, Japan Jun Terao Postdoctoral RA 2000-2003 University of Tokyo, Japan Dönüs Tuncel Postdoctoral RA 2000-2002 University of Bilkent, Turkey

If you are a previous member of the group please stay in touch and let us know how you are doing. It's always nice to know how the people you have worked with are getting on and what they are currently doing. (Please click here to update your current status)
